mapper.select:
SELECT rpsr.station_code AS stationCode, GROUP_CONCAT(rp.`status`) as statusStr FROM repair_pool rp LEFT JOIN repair_pool_station_rel rpsr ON rpsr.repair_pool_code = rp.`code`
rp.is_manual = 0
and date_format(rp.start_time ,'%Y-%m-%d') >= date_format(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d') and date_format(rp.start_time ,'%Y-%m-%d') <= date_format(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
GROUP BY rpsr.station_code
